funding-statement: This article draws on data from GENNOVATE case studies developed in Bangladesh under the CGIAR Research Programmes on Wheat and Maize – which also funded data collection. Research methodology development was supported by the CGIAR Gender and Agricultural Research Network, the World Bank and the CGIAR Research Programme on WHEAT and MAIZE. Data analysis was supported by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and the CGIAR Research Programme on WHEAT and MAIZE.
